    • Method Detail

      • runGame

        public void runGame(char choice)
        Method that runs the game. Runs a while loop that breaks when the player selects the quit option 'Q' when prompted. Prints out a menu (could probably be put in a method) as well as calls selected methods when the player makes a choice. This method is responsible for closing the scanner at the end of the game, so take care when attempting to access the scanner once this method has run.

      • shiftSentence

        public java.lang.String shiftSentence(java.lang.String shiftValue)
        Provides the interface information for the shift sentence option when selected by the player. Calls the EncryptTool class to actually do the work. Take note that this actually shifts backwards instead of forwards. Also note that this method will only shift by a maximum of 25 characters at a time.
        Returns:
        Mutated string that has been shifted by the EncryptTool.

      • substituteLetter

        public java.lang.String substituteLetter(char replacedLetter,
                                         char replacementLetter)
        Provides the interface information for the substitution option when selected by the player. Calls the EncryptTool class to actually do the work.
        Returns:
        Mutated string that has been substituted by the EncryptTool.

      • scoreSentence

        public void scoreSentence(java.lang.String strp_attemptSentence)
        Scores the current sentences as modified by the player, giving 5 points per matched character. The method then adds the points gained to the player object's score.
        Parameters:
        strp_attemptSentence - Current sentence that has been modified by the player.
